search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Help Scout (help-scout.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: Here is the official pricing page for Help Scout: [https://www.helpscout.com/pricing/](https://www.helpscout.com/pricing/) .

extracted_content.content:
_Delight_ more customerswith unlimited users
--------------------------------------------

### Free

$0

**For 50 contacts per month**  
and unlimited users

###### Get started with...

*   Inbox with all channels
*   Docs knowledge base
*   Help widget with AI answers
*   Unlimited AI drafts
*   In-app messaging
*   Basic Reporting
*   [and more](https://www.helpscout.com/pricing/#compare-plans-and-features)

[Sign up](https://secure.helpscout.net/members/register/44/)

### Standard

$50/month

**Starts with 100 contacts per month**  
and unlimited users

###### All Free features and...

*   Multiple Inboxes and Docs sites
*   API and 100+ integrations
*   Advanced Reports
*   Surveys & NPS
*   CSAT ratings
*   Customer Properties
*   [and more](https://www.helpscout.com/pricing/#compare-plans-and-features)

[Try for free](https://secure.helpscout.net/members/register/51/)

### Plus

$75/month

**Starts with 100 contacts per month**  
and unlimited users

###### All Standard features and...

*   Salesforce, Jira, HubSpot apps
*   Custom Fields
*   Advanced Permissions
*   Teams
*   Advanced Views & Workflows
*   Restricted Docs sites
*   [and more](https://www.helpscout.com/pricing/#compare-plans-and-features)

[Try for free](https://secure.helpscout.net/members/register/52/)

### Pro

**Starts with 1,000 contacts** and includes additional security, higher plan limits, and dedicated onboarding.

[Talk to Sales](https://www.helpscout.com/lp/get-a-demo/)

### Fair Billing Policy

Seasonality shouldn’t break the bank. To keep your monthly bill predictable, Help Scout determines your contact tier based on your trailing three-month average.

**As a result, Help Scout’s pricing is 34% less variable than per-seat billing.**

### Shopping around?  
Compare us to Zendesk

Monthly contact volume\*About **750** _emails_ or _tickets_ per month for most customers

Support team size\*Estimate only, please check competitor site for full details.

Help Scout Standard

$295/month

**With 500 contacts**  
and unlimited users

[Try for free](https://secure.helpscout.net/members/register/51/)

Zendesk

Suite Team

$675/month

Priced at $55/user and $1 per AI resolution

### We’ve got your back, all day (almost) every day

Every Help Scout plan comes with world-class email, chat, and self-service support. The team is available 24 hours a day, six days a week. Plus you’ll have access to our help center and customer education resources around the clock.

[Attend a class or watch a demo](https://www.helpscout.com/classes/)

More than 12,000 businesses delight their customers with Help Scout
-------------------------------------------------------------------

30min

92%

Businesses report increased loyalty  by focusing on customer service.

30%

Reduce email volume by 30% with self-serve support.

FAQs
----

We switched our billing metric from users to contacts for a few reasons:

*   **It’s more predictable**. We ran the numbers and found contact billing is 34% more predictable month-to-month than it was with users.
    
*   **Everyone is invited.** With unlimited users, you no longer have to worry about managing seats or siloing customer feedback to a small group of people.
    
*   **It aligns with our values.** We only earn revenue when the platform enables you to help customers.
    

A contact is someone who received a reply from your team or had their question resolved by the AI assistant. Multiple conversations with the same person count as one contact.

Here are three different ways to help determine the unique contacts you serve each month:

*   For a quick estimate, multiply your total monthly ticket/email count by 0.7. This ratio is based on data we’ve collected from other Help Scout customers and will help you make an educated guess.
    
*   Import your data once you’ve started a free trial. We recommend importing at least 90 days of activity to get a precise contact count. You won’t be charged for any imported conversations.
    
*   Sign up for the Free plan. Once you start helping customers, you can monitor your contact count and upgrade if you need more than 50 per month.
    

Help Scout offers a 30-day money-back guarantee in case you’re surprised by a bill. However, after a few months of using the platform, your contact count will be clear and predictable.

Discover Help Scout’s pricing plans for customer support software that’s built for growing businesses at a fraction of the cost of competitive tools.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing is based on contact volume with unlimited users. Additional features and integrations are available at higher tiers.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: For 50 contacts per month and unlimited users.
Starts with 100 contacts per month and unlimited users.
Starts with 100 contacts per month and unlimited users.
Starts with 1,000 contacts and includes additional security, higher plan limits, and dedicated onboarding.

additional_fees.fee_description: Add extra Docs sites for $20/month each.
